short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Recieve the best customer support experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ascendo is a Self Learning, Human-Connected support experience SaaS solution. Ascendo connects human and machine seamlessly to radically improve the way companies provide customer support across all channels. The Google extension application helps the support agents get solutions to customer questions, and where needed works in conjunction with the native CRM application for seamless integrated user experience. The extension also provides predicted guidance on solving the customer support questions.
